Context: The George Brown College's Centre for Business offers 33 diploma, degree, and postgraduate programs at their downtown Toronto location near the business hub. Some programs include experiential learning or work experience. They have international recognition from the Accreditation Council for Business Schools and Programs (ACBSP) for 14 of their diplomas, advanced diplomas, and degree programs. Prospective students can attend monthly information sessions to learn more about the programs and facilities. The Centre for Business holds ACBSP accreditation, making George Brown one of only two colleges in Ontario with this recognition. Online postgraduate certificate programs offer flexibility for working professionals with evening and weekend classes and some programs include a work term. For more information on their online programs, classrooms, consulting labs, land acknowledgment, application deadlines, college news, upcoming events, tours, and other inquiries, contact 416-415-2000 or ask.george@georgebrown.ca. George Brown College's website information is subject to change without notice.
